channel.title: YouTube on Wimpy's World
channel.description: Recent content in YouTube on Wimpy's World

item.title: Live
item.author: martin@wimpress.com (Martin Wimpress)
item.description:
My Twitch and YouTube channels are a celebration of Desktop Linux 🐧 and include live coding on various projects such as Debian, Ubuntu, MATE Desktop 🧉, Nix ❄ and making Raspberry Pi devices. I’m an OBS Studio nerd 🤓 and love to tinker with effects and interactive features. If you stream using Linux and have questions, please do ask 👍

Although the channels were started by me, it has become a place for our community to create new projects, collaborate, learn and succeed together. You’re invited to join us 🎟
item.summary: My Twitch and YouTube channels are a celebration of Desktop Linux 🐧 and include live coding on various projects such as Debian, Ubuntu, MATE Desktop 🧉, Nix ❄ and making Raspberry Pi devices. I’m an OBS Studio nerd 🤓 and love to tinker with effects and interactive features.
